snippet: A federal judge who ruled that the Maricopa County Sheriff’s Office racially profiled Latinos delayed instituting remedies on Friday to allow parties time to agree on options.
abstract: Federal Judge Murray Snow, who ruled that Maricopa County, Ariz, Sherriff's Office racially profiled Latinos, delays instituting remedies to allow parties time to agree on options.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge who ruled that the Maricopa County Sheriff’s Office racially profiled Latinos delayed instituting remedies on Friday to allow parties time to agree on options.

headline.main: Arizona: Monitor Is Likely in Case Against Maricopa County Sheriff
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Monitor Is Likely In Case Against Maricopa County Sheriff
